bug.title: Role cannot be assigned (PROD)
bug.body: Assigned role is not saved after form submission. No errors, no exceptions. Reproducible on PROD.

bug.title: Add null-check on 'role' field in 'User' object in 'UserController'
Inventorying to zero should be possible
bug.body: Administrator should have possibility to remove product completely from the storage. Validation restricts this for now. ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5836750/38663752-66160e44-3e40-11e8-9a29-32f97310bb97.png)

bug.title: Reports calculation are invalid when user is removed from team
Deleted users in managers list on new/edit order screen
bug.body: User with deleted flag are also shown in the list, they should be filtered out.

bug.title: "Бригады" vs "Помесячный отчет" screen error when no users assigned to team
Freemarker formatting of ids that contain more than 3 digits (started with 1 000) - formatting should be removed by converting to number
Admin as a manager (possible bug)
bug.body: Игорь Гармата (Администратор): - я в новый заказ поставил себя вместо менеджера,и сбой произошёл в канбане. Unfortunately, no additional info, but we still need to check this.

bug.title: не работает движение по кабану
bug.body: Игорь Гармата (garmata@vfasad.com.ua) Привет!Русалка неотправляет заказ в работу. При нажатии в работу в окне вываливается ошибка.: Расходные материалы будут списаны со склада! FreeMarker template error (DEBUG mode; use RETHROW in production!): The following has evaluated to null or missing: ==> user [in template "order/kanban-dashboard.ftl" at line 192, column 22] ---- Tip: If the failing expression is known to be legally refer to something that's sometimes null or missing, either specify a default value like myOptionalVar!myDefault, or use <#if myOptionalVar??>when-present<#else>when-missing. (These only cover the last step of the expression; to cover the whole expression, use parenthesis: (myOptionalVar.foo)!myDefault, (myOptionalVar.foo)?? ---- ---- FTL stack trace ("~" means nesting-related): - Failed at: #if user.role == "ROLE_ADMIN" || user... [in template "order/kanban-dashboard.ftl" at line 192, column 17] ---- Java stack trace (for programmers): ---- freemarker.core.InvalidReferenceException: [... Exception message was already printed; see it above ...] at

bug.title: КРИТ: изменение заказа
bug.body: При изменении созданного заказа не дает поменять цифры, и даже "документ". падает в ошибку. Как в этапе туду, так и в процессе. плюс должны быть отмена заказа, это напишу отдельной ишуей
